name: Touch Physics 2
description:
You've asked for it, we've listened. The professor has emerged from his lab with 50 new levels of progressively challenging fun. It's time to play the phenomenal sequel to Touch Physics, the game that allows you to be in control of the wheel's destiny.

He has packed the cellular download limit to the max! Try out his new neon crayon levels, take a trip in the "yellow submarine" and find your "oasis" in the "rat race".


"Game of the Year Award for iPhone" - haz.de

"As scientifically fascinating as the original" Bronze Award - Pocket Gamer

"Draw your way to victory" - iPhone Games Directory

"Top 100 iPhone Games 2009 Award" - iLounge

"Hottest Award" - iPhone Apps Plus

"Very very cool game, good mind teaser" - Today in iPhone

"Painfully addictive" - MacBreak Weekly

"Touch Physics is a fantastic game. Great value for the price" - 148Apps

"One more reason to keep touching my iPhone" - TouchMyApps

"One of the very best inexpensive games we've seen on the iPhone to date" - iLounge


Are you up to the challenge? Can you take on the laws of physics to complete all 50 levels? Touch Physics is an innovative game that allows you to be in control of the wheel's destiny. Change the laws of physics to suit your game play!

You draw shapes with a crayon that come to life on your iPhone / iPod Touch. You use these shapes to interact with the wheel, causing it to move according to physical laws. When it reaches the star, the level is complete.

Beware, this is not as simple as it sounds! Levels progress in difficulty, do you dare to compete? Addictive fun and fury all in one package.

A video of Touch Physics in action can be seen at: http://www.gamez4touch.com/
